TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WSDualHttpSecurityMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the different security modes for .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration defines the security modes that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding?displayProperty=fullName> supports.
## Examples The following code shows how to set <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Mode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to a member of this enumeration.
[!code-cs[S_UEWSDualHttpSecurity#30](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ws_0_1.cs)] [!code-vb[S_UEWSDualHttpSecurity#30](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.ws_0_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurityMode Message = int32(1)

Docs.summary: SOAP message-level security is used and the settings in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property become effective.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurityMode None = int32(0)
